name: ensuing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening after something and because of it: An argument broke out and in the ensuing fight, a gun went off. He lost his job and in the ensuing months became more and more depressed.

happening after or following something else: In the ensuing decades he specialized in neurology. Ensuing tests disclosed an irregular heartbeat.
